snippet: The fact that couples therapy stresses out therapists has long been an open secret, and a growing number of family therapists are talking about the challenges of the practice.
abstract: Growing number of couples therapists are opening up about the challenges of getting in between two tangled and volatile people; along with venting, some therapists are seeking to get better at their jobs by putting a greater emphasis on accountability and feedback.
lead_paragraph: The fact that couples therapy stresses out therapists has long been an open secret, and a growing number of family therapists are talking about the challenges of the practice.

headline.seo: Couples Therapists Confront the Stresses of Their Field
